description: Uptrace provides an open-source distributed tracing and metrics platform for application performance monitoring.
tldr: Uptrace offers a JSON API for ingesting and querying distributed traces and metrics, enabling developers to monitor application performance across various languages. By integrating with OpenTelemetry, the API facilitates standardized data collection and allows for custom instrumentation. Developers can use this API to send trace data, metrics, and logs to a ClickHouse-backed observability platform, perform complex queries on their application's behavior, and analyze performance bottlenecks to ensure system reliability and efficiency.
